metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20321 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: [Unknown description] It was discovered that a race condition existed in the overlay file system implementation in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-44.48').
